## Timestamp.toJSON() method

Returns a JSON-serializable representation of this Timestamp.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toJSON(): {
        seconds: number;
        nanoseconds: number;
    };
```
<b>Returns:</b>

{ seconds: number; nanoseconds: number; }
